availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Seth Williams (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, boiler rolling mill worker)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, boiler rolling mill worker. Native of Trevethin, Monmouthsire, Wales. Son of Walter Williams and Mary Williams. Married to Sarah Williams. Father of Mary F. Williams, Eliza Williams, Margaret H. Williams, Benjamin Williams, Lilly Williams, Roger Williams. Iron boiler in Breconshire, Llanelly, Wales, in 1851. Boiler rolling mill worker in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Census Returns of England and Wales (1851), Wales, Llanelly, Breconshire, Aberbaidan, Clydach, 31.
